column4: Where does a terminal window go when i minimize it?? i cant reopen it but everytime i click the terminal icon it just open a new one
Are you sure you are minimizing it?
pretty positive, i just texted it then, i minimized and it acted like it quit
Maybe the minimize and close buttons have somehow been transposed?

it doesnt do that for any other window
who   #How many entries do you get?
Open minimize that one, open another and see.
alright done, what am i looking for?
mimimize one and do   who   again.  Compare.
